title: Identifying font used on this site
content:
Hello,

Can anyone identify the typeface used on this site?  
Thank you so much!

[http://www.die-sollbruchstelle.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414220200/http:/www.die-sollbruchstelle.org/ "http://www.die-sollbruchstelle.org")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414220200im_/http:/typophile.com/files/die-sollbruchstelle_5075.jpg)
author: Jai_S

comments.content: Looks like Futura, but you should have posted this in the Type ID board.

I saw that in the source code of the website.  
The typeface is probably Soleil.  
 [http://www.type-together.com/Soleil](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414220200/http:/www.type-together.com/Soleil "http://www.type-together.com/Soleil")
